website_summaries.verdict: Great sound quality for a 10-inch powered subwoofer with some nice features.
pros: Easy-to-connect 10-inch powered subwoofer that produces great bass sound
cons: This isn't a great option if you're looking for something really powerful

customer_reviews.title: Glad I was home when it shorted out and started to burn up..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker in April of 2016 to use in my theater room. It was used occasionally, but usually not more than a few times a month. Yesterday I heard a loud thumping sound in the room, and when I went in to see what it was it was the speaker. The room smelled like something was burning, and I noticed smoke coming out of the speaker, so I unplugged it and put it outside. I am thankful that I was home and was able to unplug it before it burned up.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Faul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Sound, price, quality is excellent. I've never been disappointed with JBL. Sound is fantastic, matched to my JBL bookshelf speakers. Running through my Onkyo stereo receiver, I especially like the adj output.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: JBL always gets the job done, fabulously.
customer_reviews.text: JBL never disappoints, this model has great style too, and in white! it's on the far right in the pictures below. Door removed so it doesn't rattle with the bass, but you can leave it closed if you must. A shame to alter it's over all 'sound' by doing so. Just leave it shut when NOT using it i'd say, in this type of install.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, Low and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent low end for my in-wall JBL's Looks beautiful & will absolutely shake the entire house when cranked up. Barely need to set it to 5 to really pack a punch. Onkyo Receiver, JBL 6.5" Studio In-Wall / In-Ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: BURKE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Sub woofer delivers good deep bass and it is very powerful for its size. Good buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mc Donald

customer_reviews.title: It's JBL
customer_reviews.text: JBL always in the top of the value for the money group. Sounds fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This a great subwoofer for a small to medium room
customer_reviews.text: This a great subwoofer for a small to medium room. It's unobtrusive and could be doubled up without taking up too much floor space. I was worried it was underpowered but upon hooking it up it sounds great. It takes some tweaking of the volume and low pass (I have both set at about 1/3 of the way up). JBL quality and style as always.
customer_reviews.author: Chillwinston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It sounds awesome in my living room. Perfect for my needs. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ordered a replacement hoping it works well as we have ordered this brand before and were happy.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back didn't work, ordered a replacement hoping it works well as we have ordered this brand before and were happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Power is on. Volume is up. Subwoofer cable is plugged in subwoofer input and the other end in the receiver subwoofer output. But it won't work. Doesn't produce any sound. The top two clips for the front cover are also broken. Took a long time for me to get this and I don't know how to return it because I live in the Philippines. I bought the subwoofer cable from Amazon as well. The brand is Sewell. I don't think the cable is the problem because the red light indicator of the sub turns blue when it detects a signal.
customer_reviews.author: abotco

customer_reviews.title: It is good enough for now
customer_reviews.text: It is good enough for now. It does not have the low punch I was looking for. I am a DJ. I will be searching for better quality next time. Perhaps spending a little more could do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: jorge a. cano

customer_reviews.title: 10 inch sub
customer_reviews.text: It's a subwoofer that uses subs to woofer...I give it 5 stars.gj JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Being a low-tech end user, I can't assess the technical nitty-gritty of this subwoofer, but am very happy that... - it will rattle the room if I want to do that - it has a separate volume control - the sound is more tight and bouncy than boomy -- that works for me - this doesn't seem particularly directional...I can't find a single sweet listening spot which actually is what I prefer - never need to take the volume above 60%
customer_reviews.author: Theseus

product_meta.title: JBL Sub 100 Black 10-Inch Powered Subwoofer with High-Efficiency Class D Amplifier (Black)
product_meta.description: Style:BlackWe'd never build a JBL sound system and call it Arena without it packing powerful bass. With its 10" (250mm) high-output woofer and dual rear ports that optimize bass performance, the JBL Arena SUB 100P plays its role to perfection. The 100W high-efficiency Class-D amplifier features unobtrusive rear-mounted controls that allow for easy setup and seamless integration into your sound system.
feature_bullets: Dual rear ports optimize airflow while minimizing port turbulence and audible distortion in the bass response
Variable level, crossover, and phase controls
Contemporary cabinet shape with angled side and top panels provide a sophisticated, modern look

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
